ComicInfo.Summary:
In the last days of the Wild West, the teenaged Sixgun Samurai is on his way east to find his father, his last known living relative. But as he travels across the untamed prairie, he finds himself tangled up with dangerous men and dark motives, forcing him to use his skills as a trick shooter and a swordsman to the utmost should he wish to survive.How could a boy living in the Wild West become a sharpshooting samurai?
As Sixgun Sam explains the origin of his unique abilities, he also reveals the nature of the tragedy that claimed the life of his mother ... and sent him on a voyage to St. Louis to track down a father he's never met. With its unique premise and high-caliber action, this second installment of Sixgun Samurai promises to enthrall readers looking for something different on comic book shelves.
